thread.title: NOTICE TO ADVERTISER. Since September 29, 1991,

title: NOTICE TO ADVERTISER. Since September 29, 1991,
text:
NOTICE TO ADVERTISER. Since September 29, 1991, ad date: 10/21/2015 
Since September 29, 1991, advertising for used woodstoves has been limited to models which have been certified by the Oregon Department of Environmental Quality (DEQ) and Protection Agency (EPA) as having met smoke emission standards. A certified woodstove can be identified by its certification label, which is permanently attached to the stove. The Curry Coastal Pilot will not knowingly accept advertising for the sale of uncertified woodstoves. 
Reach all of Brookings, Harbor, and Curry County with your items to sell. 
Ads appear Online and in Print 
Ads with Photos only: Note: By using CurryPilot.com RSS feeds, you consent to be bound by the terms and conditions of our Use Policy Agreement . If you do not agree to all terms and conditions, do not use the RSS feeds. View all CurryPilot.com RSS Feeds .
